HomePage.title: Voice Clone
HomePage.description: Clone voice with AI technology, simply and effortlessly

hero.title: Voice Clone - Transform Your Voice with AI
hero.description: Create natural-sounding speech from any text using your own voice. Simple, fast, and no experience needed.

logocloud.title: Your favorite companies are our partners

useCases.title: Voice Clone Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Let AI Voice Cloning Handle the Heavy Lifting
useCases.description: Voice Clone helps you create natural-sounding speech for any purpose. Clone voice for content creation, education, business, and more—faster and easier than ever before.

item-1.title: Content Creation
item-1.description: Transform your content workflow with AI voice cloning. Create podcast episodes, YouTube narrations, and audiobook recordings using your cloned voice. Perfect for content creators who want consistent, professional voiceovers without recording every time.

item-2.title: Education & E-Learning
item-2.description: Enhance online learning with personalized voice content. Clone voice to create course materials, language learning content, and educational videos. Teachers and educators can scale their voice presence across multiple lessons and platforms.

item-3.title: Business & Marketing
item-3.description: Elevate your brand voice with consistent AI voice cloning. Create professional presentations, product demos, customer service messages, and marketing videos. Maintain brand consistency across all voice communications.

item-4.title: Accessibility & Assistive Technology
item-4.description: Empower individuals with speech difficulties through voice cloning technology. Restore lost voices, create personalized communication aids, and provide voice assistance for those who need it. AI voice clone technology for meaningful impact.

item-5.title: Entertainment & Media
item-5.description: Revolutionize media production with AI voice cloning. Create character voices for games, animations, and interactive media. Voice actors and studios can expand their capabilities and offer more diverse voice options to clients.

item-6.title: Personal & Family
item-6.description: Preserve precious voices and create meaningful memories. Clone voice of family members for future generations, create personalized bedtime stories, or generate voice messages. Keep loved ones' voices alive through AI voice cloning.

demo.title: See Voice Clone in Action
demo.subtitle: From Voice to Clone in Seconds
demo.description: Watch how Voice Clone turns your voice sample into natural-sounding speech generation — no recording studio or professional equipment needed.

feature-1.title: Simple Voice Recording
feature-1.description: Simply record your voice sample or upload an audio file — no professional equipment or studio setup required

feature-2.title: AI-Powered Voice Cloning
feature-2.description: Voice Clone automatically analyzes and creates your personalized voice model using advanced AI voice cloning technology

feature-3.title: Instant Text-to-Speech
feature-3.description: Generate natural speech from any text using your cloned voice. Perfect quality, instant results, unlimited possibilities

howItWorks.title: Clone Voice in 3 Easy Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: No Experience Needed
howItWorks.description: Voice Clone makes voice cloning as simple as recording your voice. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, you can go from voice sample to AI voice clone in minutes—without any technical knowledge.

step-1.title: Record or Upload Your Voice
step-1.description: Start by recording your voice sample or uploading an audio file. Voice Clone understands your unique voice characteristics—even from short recordings.
details: Record directly in your browser—Voice Clone handles the voice analysis
Voice Clone supports various audio formats and quality levels
AI-powered voice analysis works with both short and long voice samples

step-2.title: Voice Clone Creates Your Model
step-2.description: Voice Clone transforms your voice sample into a personalized AI voice model using advanced voice cloning technology and neural networks.
details: Automatically generates accurate voice models with Voice Clone's AI engine
Optimized voice synthesis for natural-sounding speech generation
No need for professional recording—Voice Clone does the heavy lifting

step-3.title: Generate Speech from Text
step-3.description: Type any text and hear it spoken in your cloned voice. Save your voice models, manage multiple voices, and generate unlimited speech content whenever needed.
details: Generate speech using Voice Clone's intuitive text-to-speech interface
Organize all your voice clones in a personal Voice Clone workspace
Export in high-quality audio formats; additional formats coming soon

aiCapabilities.title: Voice Clone AI Capabilities
aiCapabilities.subtitle: Smarter Voice Cloning Powered by Advanced AI
aiCapabilities.description: Voice Clone uses advanced AI technology and voice synthesis models to turn your voice samples into perfect, natural-sounding speech generation—fast, accurate, and effortless.
aiCapabilities.capability-1: Advanced Voice Analysis – Voice Clone understands unique voice characteristics and translates them into personalized AI voice models
aiCapabilities.capability-2: Advanced Voice Synthesis – Automatically generates natural-sounding speech with proper intonation and emotion
aiCapabilities.capability-3: AI-Powered Voice Cloning – Create and manage multiple voice models without complex training processes
aiCapabilities.capability-4: Multi-language Support – Clone voice and generate speech in multiple languages you're comfortable with
aiCapabilities.capability-5: Context-Aware Speech Generation – Voice Clone intelligently adjusts tone and pacing based on text content and context

features.title: Powerful Voice Cloning Features
features.subtitle: AI-Powered Voice Clone Technology
features.description: Voice Clone offers a comprehensive set of features designed to make voice cloning effortless, intelligent, and professional.

item-1.title: Instant Voice Cloning
item-1.description: Upload your voice sample and let AI instantly clone voice with remarkable accuracy. No technical skills or lengthy training required—just record your voice and see it transformed into a personalized AI voice model.

item-2.title: Personal Voice Library & Management
item-2.description: Keep all your voice clones organized in one secure workspace. Our platform provides a personal voice library where you can access, manage, and generate speech from your saved voice models with ease.

item-3.title: Intuitive Text-to-Speech Interface
item-3.description: Easily generate natural speech from any text using your cloned voice. Type your content, select your voice model, and get high-quality audio output with simple clicks—no learning curve.

item-4.title: Export & Share Anywhere
item-4.description: Export your generated speech in high-quality audio formats for any use case. Support for multiple audio formats ensures compatibility with your favorite platforms and applications.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that works best for you

item-1.question: Is there a free version of Voice Clone?
item-1.answer: Yes. Voice Clone offers a generous free tier — every registered user can clone voice and generate speech content daily for free. Perfect for trying out our voice cloning technology.

item-2.question: What audio formats can I export my cloned voice to?
item-2.answer: Currently, we support exporting voice clones in high-quality audio formats. In future updates, we plan to add support for additional formats including MP3, WAV, and FLAC.

item-3.question: Can I manage my voice clones and access them later?
item-3.answer: Yes. Voice Clone provides a personal voice library where you can save, manage, and use your voice models anytime, from anywhere.

item-4.question: What AI capabilities does Voice Clone offer?
item-4.answer: Voice Clone uses advanced neural networks to analyze your voice characteristics and create personalized AI voice models. The AI handles voice synthesis, natural speech generation, and maintains consistent voice quality across all content.

item-5.question: How can I upgrade or change my plan?
item-5.answer: Yes. You can freely upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan through your account's billing settings.

item-6.question: How long of audio content can Voice Clone generate?
item-6.answer: There is no strict limit on the length of generated speech. The actual capability depends on your plan and the complexity of your text input.

item-7.question: How do I create effective voice clones?
item-7.answer: Upload clear, high-quality voice samples with good audio quality. Speak naturally and include varied expressions. Voice Clone's AI will analyze your voice characteristics and create an accurate voice model.

item-8.question: Can teams share voice clones and collaborate?
item-8.answer: Currently, Voice Clone is built for individual use with personal voice libraries. Team collaboration and shared voice workspaces are part of our future roadmap.

item-9.question: Can I clone voice from existing audio files?
item-9.answer: Yes! Voice Clone supports uploading existing audio files for voice cloning. We support various audio formats and can extract voice characteristics from your uploaded recordings.
